trans-unit.source: Data Movement Activities
trans-unit.target: Data Movement Activities

trans-unit.source: Learn about Data Factory entities that you can use in an Data Factory pipelines to move data.
trans-unit.target: Learn about Data Factory entities that you can use in an Data Factory pipelines to move data.

trans-unit.source: Data Movement Activities
trans-unit.target: Data Movement Activities

trans-unit.source: Data factory has a <link><linkText>globally available service</linkText><title></title></link> to support data movement with <link><linkText>Copy activity</linkText><title></title></link> across a variety of data stores listed below.
trans-unit.target: Data factory has a <link><linkText>globally available service</linkText><title></title></link> to support data movement with <link><linkText>Copy activity</linkText><title></title></link> across a variety of data stores listed below.

trans-unit.source: Data factory also has built-in support for <link><linkText>securely moving data between on-premises locations and cloud</linkText><title></title></link> using the data management gateway.
trans-unit.target: Data factory also has built-in support for <link><linkText>securely moving data between on-premises locations and cloud</linkText><title></title></link> using the data management gateway.

trans-unit.source: Supported data stores for Copy Activity
trans-unit.target: Supported data stores for Copy Activity

trans-unit.source: Copy activity copies data from a source data store to a sink data store.
trans-unit.target: Copy activity copies data from a source data store to a sink data store.

trans-unit.source: Data factory supports the following data stores and source, sink combinations.
trans-unit.target: Data factory supports the following data stores and source, sink combinations.

trans-unit.source: Click on a data store to learn how to copy data from/to that store.
trans-unit.target: Click on a data store to learn how to copy data from/to that store.

trans-unit.target: Source

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Copy Activity
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Copy Activity

trans-unit.source: Copy activity takes one input dataset (source) and copies data per activity configuration to one output dataset (sink).
trans-unit.target: Copy activity takes one input dataset (source) and copies data per activity configuration to one output dataset (sink).

trans-unit.source: Data copy is done in a batch fashion according to the schedule specified on the activity.
trans-unit.target: Data copy is done in a batch fashion according to the schedule specified on the activity.

trans-unit.source: To learn about defining activities in general at a high level such as various JSON sections and properties available for all activities, see <link><linkText>Understanding Pipelines & Activities</linkText><title></title></link> article.
trans-unit.target: To learn about defining activities in general at a high level such as various JSON sections and properties available for all activities, see <link><linkText>Understanding Pipelines & Activities</linkText><title></title></link> article.

trans-unit.source: Copy activity provides the following capabilities:
trans-unit.target: Copy activity provides the following capabilities:

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Globally available data movement
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Globally available data movement

trans-unit.source: The data movement service powering copy activity is available globally in the following regions and geographies.
trans-unit.target: The data movement service powering copy activity is available globally in the following regions and geographies.

trans-unit.source: The globally available topology ensures efficient data movement avoiding cross-region hops in most cases.
trans-unit.target: The globally available topology ensures efficient data movement avoiding cross-region hops in most cases.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Securely move data between on-premises location and cloud
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Securely move data between on-premises location and cloud

trans-unit.source: One of the challenges for modern data integration is to seamlessly move data to and from on-premises to cloud.
trans-unit.target: One of the challenges for modern data integration is to seamlessly move data to and from on-premises to cloud.

trans-unit.source: Data management gateway is an agent you can install on-premises to enable hybrid data pipelines.
trans-unit.target: Data management gateway is an agent you can install on-premises to enable hybrid data pipelines.

trans-unit.source: The data gateway provides the following capabilities:
trans-unit.target: The data gateway provides the following capabilities:

trans-unit.source: Manage access to on-premises data stores securely.
trans-unit.target: Manage access to on-premises data stores securely.

trans-unit.source: Model on-premises data stores and cloud data stores within the same data factory and move data.
trans-unit.target: Model on-premises data stores and cloud data stores within the same data factory and move data.

trans-unit.source: Have a single pane of glass for monitoring and management with visibility into gateway status with data factory cloud based dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Have a single pane of glass for monitoring and management with visibility into gateway status with data factory cloud based dashboard.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Move data between on-premises and cloud</linkText><title></title></link> for more details.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Move data between on-premises and cloud</linkText><title></title></link> for more details.

trans-unit.source: Reliable and cost effective data movement
trans-unit.target: Reliable and cost effective data movement

trans-unit.source: Copy activity is designed to move large volumes of data in a reliable way, resistant to transient errors across a large variety of data sources.
trans-unit.target: Copy activity is designed to move large volumes of data in a reliable way, resistant to transient errors across a large variety of data sources.

trans-unit.source: Data can be copied in a cost effective way with the option to enable compression over the wire.
trans-unit.target: Data can be copied in a cost effective way with the option to enable compression over the wire.

trans-unit.source: Type conversions across different type systems
trans-unit.target: Type conversions across different type systems

trans-unit.source: Different data stores have different native type systems.
trans-unit.target: Different data stores have different native type systems.

trans-unit.source: Copy activity performs automatic type conversions from source types to sink types with the following 2 step approach:
trans-unit.target: Copy activity performs automatic type conversions from source types to sink types with the following 2 step approach:

trans-unit.source: Convert from native source types to .NET type
trans-unit.target: Convert from native source types to .NET type

trans-unit.source: Convert from .NET type to native sink type
trans-unit.target: Convert from .NET type to native sink type

trans-unit.source: You can find the mapping for a given native type system to .NET for the data store in the respective data store connector articles.
trans-unit.target: You can find the mapping for a given native type system to .NET for the data store in the respective data store connector articles.

trans-unit.source: You can use these mappings to determine appropriate types while creating your tables so that right conversions are performed during Copy activity.
trans-unit.target: You can use these mappings to determine appropriate types while creating your tables so that right conversions are performed during Copy activity.

trans-unit.source: Working with different file formats
trans-unit.target: Working with different file formats

trans-unit.source: For file based sources Copy activity supports variety of file format including binary, text and Avro formats.
trans-unit.target: For file based sources Copy activity supports variety of file format including binary, text and Avro formats.

trans-unit.source: Copy Activity Properties
trans-unit.target: Copy Activity Properties

trans-unit.source: Properties like name, description, input and output tables, various policies etc are available for all types of activities.
trans-unit.target: Properties like name, description, input and output tables, various policies etc are available for all types of activities.

trans-unit.source: Properties available in the typeProperties section of the activity on the other hand vary with each activity type.
trans-unit.target: Properties available in the typeProperties section of the activity on the other hand vary with each activity type.

trans-unit.source: In case of Copy activity the typeProperties section varies depending on the types of sources and sinks.
trans-unit.target: In case of Copy activity the typeProperties section varies depending on the types of sources and sinks.

trans-unit.source: Each of the data store specific page listed above documents these properties specific to the data store type.
trans-unit.target: Each of the data store specific page listed above documents these properties specific to the data store type.
